trans-unit.source: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Consente agli sviluppatori di eseguire l'override del rendering per solo sezioni selezionate della <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o controlli del server in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or server control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Colore di Web part fa riferimento agli elementi di interfaccia utente dell'utente delle periferiche che circondano ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo o controllo server contenuto un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>fuso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Il colore di un controllo include un bordo, la barra del titolo e icone, il testo del titolo e menu dei verbi visualizzati all'interno della barra del titolo.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: L'aspetto del riquadro è impostato a livello di zona e si applica a tutti i controlli server nella zona.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set uses the WebPartChrome class to render the chrome for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part utilizza la classe WebPartChrome per eseguire il rendering del colore per <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any individual section (such as the header or footer) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone without having to handle all the rendering for those controls.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, questa classe fornisce un modo per gli sviluppatori di personalizzare il rendering di ogni singola sezione (ad esempio intestazione o piè di pagina) del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona senza dover gestire tutto il rendering di tali controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A> method to customize some specific style attributes applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, but you can rely on the default rendering to handle the rest.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>metodo per personalizzare alcuni attributi di stile specifico applicato al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>area, ma è possibile basarsi sul rendering predefinito per gestire il resto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartChrome class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartChrome contiene diversi metodi importanti che sono utili quando si desidera eseguire l'override del rendering di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: One is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A> method, which enables you to change the style attributes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object associated with the WebPartChrome object used to render a control.
trans-unit.target: Uno è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>metodo, che consente di modificare gli attributi di stile del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>oggetto associato all'oggetto WebPartChrome usato per il rendering di un controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which you use when you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to create an instance of your custom WebPartChrome object.
trans-unit.target: Un'altra è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.%23ctor%2A>costruttore, che viene utilizzato quando si esegue l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A>metodo in un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe per creare un'istanza dell'oggetto personalizzato WebPartChrome.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another useful method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars).
trans-unit.target: Un altro metodo utile è la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>metodo, che è possibile utilizzare per controllare il rendering dell'area di contenuto dei controlli in una zona (a differenza degli elementi di colore, ad esempio intestazioni, piè di pagina e le barre del titolo).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.GetWebPartVerbs%2A> method enables you to exclude certain verbs from being rendered, if for some reason you do not want users to see those verbs in the UI.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.GetWebPartVerbs%2A>metodo consente di escludere alcuni verbi dal rendering, se per qualche motivo non si desidera che gli utenti visualizzino i verbi nell'interfaccia utente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.GetWebPartVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Infine, se si desidera disporre del controllo completo su tutti gli aspetti del rendering di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, è possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderWebPart%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Several properties of the WebPartChrome class are also useful.
trans-unit.target: Sono utili anche diverse proprietà della classe WebPartChrome.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.Zone%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.WebPartManager%2A> properties provide references to the zone associated with the WebPartChrome object and the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.Zone%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.WebPartManager%2A>proprietà forniscono i riferimenti alla zona associata con l'oggetto WebPartChrome e corrente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>istanza, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.WebPartManager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.Zone%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartChrome initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> class.
trans-unit.target: Il WebPartChrome Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> method to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Viene usato principalmente da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona relativi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A>metodo per creare un'istanza del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto che gestisce il rendering del colore e l'eventuale rendering personalizzato per <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli della zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on the current page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo nella pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: zone is .
trans-unit.target: zoneis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control rendered by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea l'oggetto stile che fornisce gli attributi di stile per ciascun <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> sottoposto a rendering dal controllo di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The CreateWebPartChromeStyle method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to render a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateWebPartChromeStyle crea un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>oggetto che viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto per il rendering un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The default method creates style attributes based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo predefinito crea attributi di stile in base al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A special situation occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Una situazione speciale si verifica quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo è selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the page is in a page display mode where controls can be selected, and the current control is actually selected, the default CreateWebPartChromeStyle method also merges the style information of the control with the style information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se la pagina è una modalità di visualizzazione in cui è possibile selezionare controlli e il controllo corrente è effettivamente selezionato, il metodo CreateWebPartChromeStyle predefinito unisce inoltre le informazioni sullo stile del controllo con le informazioni sullo stile di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control that is currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Controllo che viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di colore per un determinato controllo. uno del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: A that contains style attributes for the webPart.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene gli attributi di stile per il webPart .

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: chromeType is not one of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: chromeTypenon è incluso il valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether controls can be dragged into and out of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se è possano trascinare i controlli all'interno e all'esterno della zona.

trans-unit.source: The value of the DragDropEnabled property is determined by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà DragDropEnabled è determinato dal valore della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se è possano trascinare i controlli.

trans-unit.source: Excludes specific verbs from being rendered, based on criteria provided by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Esclude i verbi specifici vengano sottoposti a rendering, in base ai criteri fornite dallo sviluppatore.

trans-unit.source: The FilterWebPartVerbs method provides a way to automatically filter certain verbs from the collection of verbs associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and prevent the filtered verbs from being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo FilterWebPartVerbs consente di filtrare automaticamente alcuni verbi dalla raccolta di verbi associati a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllare e impedire il rendering di verbi filtrati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection of all verbs associated with the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di tutti i verbi associati con il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: A containing all verbs associated with the webPart.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto contenente tutti i verbi associati con la webPart .

trans-unit.source: Gets the client ID for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object as rendered in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ID client per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> oggetto eseguito il rendering in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPartChromeClientID method gets the client ID of the table that contains the `webPart` being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetWebPartChromeClientID Ottiene l'ID client della tabella che contiene il `webPart` viene eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: The table is the rendered output that corresponds directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object, and is used as a container to apply styles and create a modular layout for the control.
trans-unit.target: La tabella è riportato l'output di rendering che corrisponde direttamente al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>dell'oggetto e viene utilizzato come contenitore per applicare gli stili e creare un layout modulare per il controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: It is useful to get the client ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object for client-side scripting purposes, if you want to change something in the chrome without having to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: È utile ottenere l'ID client del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>dell'oggetto per scopi di scripting sul lato client, se si desidera modificare un elemento nel riquadro senza dover eseguire la pagina al server.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the client ID for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID client per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the client ID for the table cell that contains the title for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ID client per la cella di tabella che contiene il titolo di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPartTitleClientID method retrieves the client ID value for the table cell that contains the title of the `webPart` being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetWebPartTitleClientID recupera il valore di ID client per la cella di tabella che contiene il titolo del `webPart` viene eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: An important scenario in which the GetWebPartTitleClientID method is used to get the client ID of the title cell of the `webPart` is for the Web Parts drag-and-drop feature.
trans-unit.target: Un importante scenario in cui il metodo GetWebPartTitleClientID viene utilizzato per ottenere l'ID client della cella del titolo di `webPart` è per la funzionalità di trascinamento e rilascio di Web part.

trans-unit.source: The method is also useful for other client-side scripting purposes.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo è utile anche per altri scopi scripting sul lato client.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the title or the style of the cell with client-side scripting, rather than having to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile modificare il titolo o lo stile della cella con gli script sul lato client, anziché dover registrare la pagina al server.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the client ID for the title of the webPart.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID client per il titolo del webPart .

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of verbs that should be rendered with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di verbi che deve essere eseguito il rendering con un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPartVerbs method provides developers with an opportunity to override the method and exclude certain verbs from being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetWebPartVerbs fornisce agli sviluppatori di eseguire l'override del metodo ed escludere alcuni verbi dal rendering.

trans-unit.source: This is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.FilterWebPartVerbs%2A> method, which also can exclude verbs from being rendered.
trans-unit.target: È simile al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.FilterWebPartVerbs%2A>metodo, che consente di escludere i verbi da cui viene eseguito il rendering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.FilterWebPartVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the GetWebPartVerbs method is not meant for cases where you want to check some criteria to decide whether to render a verb.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il metodo di GetWebPartVerbs non è indicato per i casi in cui si desidera verificare alcuni criteri per decidere se eseguire il rendering di un verbo.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this method is useful when you know in advance that you always want to exclude a certain verb.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, questo metodo è utile quando si conosce in anticipo che si desidera sempre escludere un verbo specifico.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you develop a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> class, you might decide that you always want to exclude the close verb on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, so that users can never close the controls.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si sviluppa un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>(classe), si potrebbe decidere che si desidera sempre escludere il verbo di chiusura nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, in modo che gli utenti non possono chiudere mai i controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: Rather than setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property to `false` on all the controls, you can simply override the GetWebPartVerbs method and exclude close verbs from being rendered on any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control rendered with your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object.
trans-unit.target: Anziché impostare la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>proprietà `false` su tutti i controlli, è possibile eseguire l'override del metodo GetWebPartVerbs semplicemente e impedisce che tali verbi viene eseguito il rendering in qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo eseguito il rendering con personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: A containing all the verbs that should be rendered with webPart.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto contenente tutti i verbi che devono essere eseguito il rendering con webPart .

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Esegue le attività che devono essere eseguite prima del rendering <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Renders the main content area of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, excluding the header and footer.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering dell'area di contenuto principale di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo, ad eccezione dell'intestazione e piè di pagina.

trans-unit.source: The RenderPartContents method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `webPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo RenderPartContents consente di eseguire l'override del rendering dell'area del corpo della `webPart`, lasciando inalterato il rendering predefinito per il rendering dell'intestazione e piè di pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the `webPart` content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> che riceve il `webPart` contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: Renders a complete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control with all its sections.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering di un completo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo con tutte le relative sezioni.

trans-unit.source: The RenderWebPart method renders the complete <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, with header, contents, and footer.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo RenderWebPart esegue il rendering completo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo con intestazione, il contenuto e il piè di pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `webPart`, and for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.
trans-unit.target: Si esegue l'override in questo modo metodo uno sviluppatore a livello di programmazione del controllo completo sul rendering tutti gli aspetti del `webPart`, e per questo motivo, si esegue l'override di questo metodo è abbastanza complesso.

trans-unit.source: As with some other methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> class that developers can override, if you override this method, a common and useful approach is to call the base method first, take the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is returned, and customize some of its properties, rather than handling the complete rendering yourself.
trans-unit.target: Come con alcuni altri metodi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>classe che è possibile eseguire l'override, si esegue l'override di questo metodo, un comune e utile approccio consiste nel chiamare il metodo di base in primo luogo, eseguire il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo che viene restituito e Personalizza alcune delle relative proprietà, anziché gestire manualmente il rendering completo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the `webPart` content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> che riceve il `webPart` contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo viene attualmente eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: The control that webPart refers to is .
trans-unit.target: Il controllo che webPart fa riferimento a .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartManager property provides a reference to the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance on the page.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà WebPartManager fornisce un riferimento all'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>istanza nella pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> nella pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento all'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: The Zone property provides a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone that contains the controls for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object provides rendering.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà della zona fornisce un riferimento al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>area che contiene i controlli per cui il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto fornisce il rendering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> che è associato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref>.
